titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Stanford University, Department of Physics, Records
Stanford University, Department of Physics, Records

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit

did.head: Overview
did.unittitle: Stanford University, Department of Physics, records
did.abstract: Correspondence and news clippings regarding the Klystron Tube Research Project, 1937-1945; correspondence between department chairman Paul Kirkpatrick and Stanford President Donald B. Tresidder regarding budget and faculty matters, 1943-1947; and statements of William W. Hansen and Robert L. Wathen, 1944, regarding the physics department and research on microwave devices, with a statement by David L. Webster on Hansen's memo, 1949. The Webster and Wathen statements may have been prepared in relation to a patent case.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Stanford University, Department of Physics, Records (SC0158). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

relatedmaterial.head: Associated Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related materials: William W. Hansen Papers, David L. Webster Papers, Donald B. Tresidder Papers in the Stanford University Archives.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Correspondence and news clippings regarding the Klystron Tube Research Project, 1937-1945; correspondence between department chairman Paul Kirkpatrick and Stanford President Donald B. Tresidder regarding budget and faculty matters, 1943-1947; and statements of William W. Hansen and Robert L. Wathen, 1944, regarding the physics department and research on microwave devices, with a statement by David L. Webster on Hansen's memo, 1949. The Webster and Wathen statements may have been prepared in relation to a patent case.
